Requirement.formula: #program; var amount = User::getCurrencyAmount('MoesArk_CraftingCurrency'); var habInst = thisInstance(); if(isNULL(habInst)) { return false; } var level = Object::getVariable(habInst, 'HabitatLevel'); var configKey = '__MoesArk_BalanceConfig:LevelUpCosts:BaboonCountyUSAFromInternalLevel' + level + '__'; var target = toDouble(System::getConfigValue(configKey)); if(target >= 999999) { return false; } return amount >= target;

ScriptTrigger.title: UI_Habitat_Upgrade
ScriptTrigger.formulaRequirement: #program; var animalHabitat = Array::getValueForKey(System::script, 'ObjectInstance'); if((Object::getVariableAsNumber(animalHabitat, 'HabitatLevel')==0)) { return Requirements::checkRequirementList('MoesArk_Requirements:HabitatUpgrade_Unlocked'); } return false;

Requirement.formula: #program; var amount = User::getCurrencyAmount('MoesArk_CraftingCurrency'); var habInst = thisInstance(); if(isNULL(habInst)) { return false; } var level = Object::getVariable(habInst, 'HabitatLevel'); var configKey = '__MoesArk_BalanceConfig:LevelUpCosts:WarmongersFromInternalLevel' + level + '__'; var target = toDouble(System::getConfigValue(configKey)); if(target >= 999999) { return false; } return amount >= target;

ScriptTrigger.title: UI_Habitat_Upgrade
ScriptTrigger.formulaRequirement: #program; var animalHabitat = Array::getValueForKey(System::script, 'ObjectInstance'); if((Object::getVariableAsNumber(animalHabitat, 'HabitatLevel')==0)) { return Requirements::checkRequirementList('MoesArk_Requirements:HabitatUpgrade_Unlocked'); } return false;

ScriptTrigger.title: UI_Habitat_Upgrade
ScriptTrigger.formulaRequirement: #program; var animalHabitat = Array::getValueForKey(System::script, 'ObjectInstance'); if((Object::getVariableAsNumber(animalHabitat, 'HabitatLevel')==1)) { return Requirements::checkRequirementList('MoesArk_Requirements:HabitatUpgrade_Unlocked'); } return false;

EffectOverlay.formulaRequirement: #program; var animalHabitat = Array::getValueForKey(System::script, 'ObjectInstance'); if((Object::getVariableAsNumber(animalHabitat, 'Slot1')==1)) { return true; } return false;
